recommendations.recommendation: The best anime ever made, 5 fucking starts!

Just me, Desire + ever17 = Steinsgate.
ps: gets better after ep 12.
The show is ok, full of tropes, cliches, and flat characters in a disguise harem setting but if you haven`t seen much and can`t recognize these, then yeah it`s a good show.

this anime took about 10 episodes to reach me, i really couldn`t understand all the fuss about it until then. now i`m addicted and it`s so awesome, thrilling and original! be patient unitl you reach ep 10 and above to see its full potential, you won`t regret it.

If you understand a little about this computer stuff the hacking part is just a big *facepalm* (thats what i hate about cyberpunk) I think it also applies to physicists and the LHC stuff. But overall it was nice to watch.
Seems silly in the beginning, but give it time and it will grow in every way
best story
Epic Sci-Fi Anime. Recommended for you..

Overrated anime. It starts out quite interesting, but quickly develops into a mundane "repeat the same day over again" story kind of like the movie Run Lola Run. Most of the characters are stereotypes: the tsundere love interest, the moe childhood friend, the overweight otaku/hacker, the shy androgynous character, the overly cute "nyan nyan" character, etc. However, the main character is good, there is above average character development, and for the most part the show is entertaining. However, it had so much more potential than what it became.

Usually, I don`t like too many jokes, but the balance of humor and seriousness is well put here. Inteligent sci-fi and great plot until now, without mention the excentric Okabe, that will pull out many laughters for sure. All will depend on how they will develop the story from now on, but until now, I recommend you to watch this.
When I saw the first episode, i thought it will be a bad sci-fi show, but after some time, it started to be a great comedy :) I highly reccomend this :)

A pretty good anime with 2 distinct phases which are separated at the middle (12 episodes more or less). This could be a great one if not for the stereotypical characterization often found in anime. Still, very worth a watch and I`d recommend watching the first episode again after seeing the whole series just to check how everything connects just right.

It has a rough start but once you get deep into it you know what to expect from the following episodes. There is some comic relief spread into various episodes to relieve some of the tension in a rather serious setting. While not flawless(I`ve noticed various mistakes with one of them being from the animation studio`s/director`s side, not being able to fully express the seiyuu`s depth of the protagonist`s character, Okabe Rintarou) it is certainly worth a watch for the other serious subjects it touches(even if just a little) such as homosexuality and to what great lengths people would go to attain a sense of belonging.
A very mature and happy ending as a truly fitting conclusion. Recommended.
Totally marvelous design and psychology of characters. Tut-tu-roo!
Incredible anime adaptation of the visual novel. Soundtrack is very good and the characters are interesting. It`s a very sad anime, I think almost every named character cries at least once.

EP 1-11 was kinda slow and boring, imo.
Very good anime.

Not bad, but not the best either. Takes a while to really get going, and the last 4 or 5 episodes will drive you crazy if you don`t have a lot of patience for filler scenes and filler dialogue that do nothing to drive the plot. It`s worth the time to watch it, at the very least. If you consider yourself an anime connoisseur, you should probably watch it.
Odd cast but the story is incredibly interesting in terms of plot. While the story moves slowly at times, the show doesn`t get quite boring and the plot still manages to keep your attention.
I have to agree! It`s one hella interesting mystery sci-fi series. Kept me glued to my seat on wanting to know what happen next & next etc etc :) Satisfying ending too!

Pretty good anime IMO. Good mix of plot, storyline, and drama. If you`re watching this you should probably note that it does start a little bit slow and confusing so hang in there until episode 7. I didn`t understand everything about time travel in there but you really don`t need to to appreciate it. Does have a bit of melancholy but it`s not that bad. Really liked it!
As far as Time Travel story goes, this one works. The story is well constructed: it builds up nicely and it`s ending with satisfactory closure.
Great and dark story about time traveling. The anime is well-made and not just something for fans of the game. Definitely recommended!
best to be seen on your IBN PC in HD monocrome.

The phrase in my mind: "post-haruhi". The series holds together quite well, at times funny, at times drama, at times soft sci-fi, rather calmly paced. Nothing that could bend your mind, but still enjoyable. At times too much of a forced certain-community-targetted jokes, but hey, let`s just ignore them [jokes].
Definitely worth the watch if you`re into well-plotted suspense.
it was simply awesome i think it was one of the best anime of this season

Watch this show damn you! Watch it! Get through the first 5-6 episodes but stick through it. Watch it until the very last second of episode 24. What the HELL are you doing still reading this! GO! WATCH IT! NOW!

This might sound like a broken record but its the best take on time travel EVER!!! And most of the science makes sense. Has everything to make it a 9 point anime. From comedy to light romance and at times serious. Best anime of 2011. Must see.

Brilliant show! a "must see" for people who like a great developing story with a awesome climax!
Dp

It`s all in there.Food for thought,sci-fi,ever increasing suspense,good comedy sometimes(not mainly comedy) and a tidbit of quality romance.Grade A++ stuff, in a time where most new series go for same ol` boring ,market tested stuff like ecchi or mindless shounen brawling.Must watch even if you`re not into sci-fi.

Propably one of the best stories out there, one of those where you have to watch the first episode again before the finale, and resultingly have your mind explode about how everything makes sense now. Even the buildup in the first half of the show is very clever with its goofy comedy and colorful characters.
the first 2 or 3 episodes weren`t good but after than it gets really interesting and it has a satisfying ending

It`s nothing like you have experience before. It`s mind blowing, heart wrenching and thrilling all at the same time. And it actually has an original, interesting male protagonist who doesn`t just trigger every flag by just being half-decent. I ended up sobbing like a little girl by the near-last episodes. The story could have been more epic if it ended with more of a tragic note. But who am I to judge. After I`m done I`ve already felt in love whole-heartedly with the characters that I just couldn`t bear seeing them in any more pain. See and judge for yourself
This should be on everybody`s short list.
this anime is inspiring very creative :D
This anime redifines epic. Clearly one of the best works in a while. You should drop whatever you are doing and watch this show NOW if you have not seen it yet.

you will get a laugh in the first 9 ep and you will cry in the rest . the plot is amazing , the characters background storys are the best , all in all a masterpiece ,abit slow to kick off but totally worth it

must see, no words for this anime. I must say that the first twelve episodes don`t make much of a sense and let you a feeling that this anime is not special...BUT from that point and till the end, not only u start to realize that everything that it showed you was important, but so awesome that u will never forget it. Awesome plot, awesome characters, awesome romance...Plus a rare plot with time manipulate mystery and invention. also MUST SEE the 25 episode that was released with blu ray.

This is something that needs to be seen!! You`ll have to endure first 12 episodes to gather needed info, but then starts the best kind of torture, you live through it side by side with main characters. Amazing story, nice characters! And this is the first time I went through the hassle of writing a recommendation!!
The best anime that I`ve seen in 2012. Seins Gate surprised me, very nice story, funny, a lot of tension and drama, great main characters. Definitly you must to see it.

I honestly tried to watch this series about 3 times in the past year or so; I never got past the 2nd episode. I then watched Chaos;head and really loved the main character and the way the story was told. So, I decided to give Steins;Gate another try. Best decision ever! While its a little slow to get going(about 3 to 4 episodes before things get laid out and a few more episodes before things pick up), it tells one of the best stories in anime. Great story-telling, great plot, amazing characters, perfect character development; there is nothing I`d change about this series. Like I said, the beginning is slow, but everything in it is important and it all makes sense later. Its got clever humor, emotions, some action, and best of all: the dialogue. You won`t regret watching this anime. Do it as soon as you can.

im in love with this anime, every episode has a shocking thing inside, that makes u to get super excited when the next episode comes out! Its fully physics and science i like it because they wont travel through time because they have god gift powers , they travel by science,, and the anime that happens in our time, makes it more lovable
You HAVE to love the characters, and the plot just drags you in. Masterpieces reloaded!!
Simply brilliant. Truly a masterpiece!
most impressive series of the 2011. it`s deserve to be called "masterpiece".

This is a must-see anime! It`s so brilliant in many ways. The first episodes aren`t that great but they are pretty much required in order to understand the storyline. It`s cool how the plot develops and gets really deep at the end of the anime :).
As for me Steins;Gate provided a lot to think about (the desire to change the past and regretting changing it etc.). I also grew to like the characters a lot. The OST is a masterpiece as well. Steins;Gate really knows how to set you in the mood. I`ll be eagerly waiting for the movie. Do yourself a favor and watch this anime!
MASTERPIECE!nothing more , nothing less!
Masterpiece.

Don`t judge a book by it`s cover. First episodes will make you think that it`s another harem trash with a stupid (borderline retarded) main character. Here`s the twist: it isn`t. Soon enough you`ll see a nicely done complex story with many interesting plot twists. There aren`t many good animes lately and this turned out astonishingly good. If you`ll ever give it a shot - watch it completely. You won`t regret it. That`s all I can say. El Psy Congroo.
Great character development and amazing story makes this a must watch for anyone, Once I started watching it grabbed me and never let go. Really enjoyed this and would reccomend it to anyone.
This Anime will do anything it can to fuck with your brain, emotions and memories, watch it trough the end and you will experience one of the best anime :) definite must see
One of the best anime

For a series that can use an aspect much detested in another series (that being a certain 8 episodes from The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi Season 2), and turn it into an intriguing, and harrowing emotional roller-coaster that keeps one engaged until the very end - a truly laudable feat indeed! Moreover, the production values of this series are very high: with attractive visuals, superb voice acting, and a well balanced, fitting, and memorable sound track (the ED in particular). Steins Gate will not disappoint those seeking an intense sci-fi drama musing over topics including time travel theories, the butterfly effect, morality, and the bonds of friendship and love - a wide enough range to pique almost anyone`s interest.

Watched it, loved it. I definitely recommend everyone to watch it. Some might find the first two or so episodes to be slow/dull, but they`re absolutely necessary. It`s what comes after that makes this anime into a masterpiece. Don`t forget to watch the DVD Special ("Episode 25")!
Funny, heart warming, bizarre, deep, interesting... How the hell did they manage to fit all this and more in one show, and so perfectly...? A must see indeed!

Don`t be discouraged by first episodes, it`s well worth the watch!
